攀.definition: to climb (by pulling oneself up); to implicate; to claim connections of higher status

攀供.definition: to implicate others, without foundation, in confessing one's own crime

攀升.definition: to clamber up; (of prices etc) to rise

攀岩.definition: rock climbing; to climb a rockface

攀折.definition: to snap off (flowers, leaves, twigs etc from a tree or shrub)

攀援.definition: to climb up (a rope etc); climbing (plant)

攀枝花市.definition: Panzhihua, prefecture-level city in Sichuan Province 四川省[Si4chuan1 Sheng3]

攀比.definition: to make invidious comparisons; to compete with; to emulate

攀登.definition: to climb; to pull oneself up; to clamber; to scale; fig. to forge ahead in the face of hardships and danger

攀緣.definition: to climb up (a rope etc); climbing (plant)

攀親.definition: to seek to profit by family ties

攀親道故.definition: (idiom) to use claims to kinship or friendship to climb socially

攀越.definition: to climb over; to get over (difficulties); to scale; to surmount

攀附.definition: to climb (of climbing plants); to creep; to cling on to; fig. to seek connection (with the rich and powerful); social climbing

攀附權貴.definition: to cling to the powerful and rich (idiom); social climbing

攀高結貴.definition: lit. to cling to the high, connect to the rich (idiom); to try to attach oneself to the rich and powerful; social climbing

攀龍附鳳.definition: see 扳龍附鳳|扳龙附凤[ban1 long2 fu4 feng4]
